articles.title: When and where to watch the Gamper Trophy between FC Barcelona and Tottenham Hotspur - FC Barcelona
articles.description: Global viewing guide to the game with Tottenham at the Lluís Companys Olympic Stadium
articles.content:
Barça entertain Tottenham Hotspur this coming Tuesday 8 August in the Joan Gamper Trophy, the first ever game for the Catalans at their temporary home, the Lluís Companys Olympic Stadium.
